scripts.cy-run:stg-smoke: CYPRESS_TEST_TAGS=@smoke $(npm bin)/cypress run --config-file cypress/config/staging.json --config $(node ./get-test-config smoke) --browser chrome --headless
scripts.cy2: CYPRESS_TEST_TAGS=@smoke $(npm bin)/cypress run --record --key 5899a0aa-92c0-495e-bec0-af43f32fcf8d --parallel --config-file cypress/config/staging.json --config $(node ./get-test-config test) --browser chrome --headless
scripts.cy3: CYPRESS_TEST_TAGS=@smoke $(npm bin)/cypress run --record --key 5899a0aa-92c0-495e-bec0-af43f32fcf8d --parallel --config-file cypress/config/staging.json --config $(node ./get-test-config test) --browser chrome --headless
scripts.cy-run:prd-test-smoke: CYPRESS_TEST_TAGS=@smoke $(npm bin)/cypress run --config-file cypress/config/prod-test.json  --config $(node ./get-test-config smoke) --browser chrome --headless
scripts.cy-run:prd-smoke: CYPRESS_TEST_TAGS=@smoke $(npm bin)/cypress run --config-file cypress/config/prod.json  --config $(node ./get-test-config smoke) --browser chrome --headless
scripts.cy:stg-percy-delivery: $(npm bin)/percy exec -- cypress run --config-file cypress/config/staging.json --config $(node ./get-test-config delivery)
scripts.report: $(npm bin)/mochawesome-merge cypress/results/reports/*.json > cypress/results/reports/report.json && $(npm bin)/marge --autoOpen true --code false --charts true cypress/results/reports/report.json -o cypress/results/reports
